video.title: Built for the Kill
video.synopsis: See the animal kingdom's greatest predators in action and learn how they develop their speed, strength and cunning into killer skills.

episodes.synopsis: Over the course of just two years, a once-helpless lion cub blossoms into a cunning killer that can take down animals many times its size.
episodes.title: Lions

episodes.synopsis: Polar bears can look pretty cute. But they're also the largest land predators on the planet with a well-honed instinct to kill.
episodes.title: Polar Bears

episodes.synopsis: A pregnant great white shark migrates some 6,000 miles across the Indian Ocean, carrying with her a formidable killer that's yet to be born.
episodes.title: Great White Sharks

episodes.synopsis: Most animals know that a crocodile is the last creature you'd want to mess with. But it takes years of training to build such a killer reputation.
episodes.title: Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: Distinctively marked killer whales come by their names honestly. But it takes years for them to develop their deadly blend of speed and strength.
episodes.title: Killer Whale

episodes.synopsis: Wolves are born to kill. But they're also born deaf and blind, weighing in at a little over a pound and surprisingly helpless and defenseless.
episodes.title: Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Though it has a reputation as a poacher and scavenger, the hyena's ability to take down its prey is no laughing matter.
episodes.title: Hyena

episodes.synopsis: Born tiny and without teeth, the grizzly bear goes through great changes over the course of just a few short years to become a fearsome killer.
episodes.title: Grizzly Bear
